aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Emits metrics about environments status for every pool
Periodically runs the environments monitor function (atmosphere-integ-dev/Atmosphere/Environments/Monitor/Function)
Emits metrics about allocations status for every pool
Periodically runs the allocations monitor function (atmosphere-integ-dev/Atmosphere/Allocations/Monitor/Function)

securityGroupEgress.description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: RESTful endpoint for the Atmosphere service
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: Atmosphere
